meanings.definition: In a manner relating to cladistics.
meanings.sent1: She analyzed the evolutionary relationships cladistically, focusing on shared derived characteristics.
meanings.sent2: The scientist approached the study cladistically, organizing species based on common ancestry.
meanings.sent3: The researcher cladistically compared the DNA sequences of different species, leading to some surprising results.
meanings.sent4: The idea of evolution can be understood cladistically as a branching tree of life.
meanings.sent5: By examining the fossil record cladistically, we can uncover the history of life on Earth.

meanings.definition: Using cladistics as a method of classification.
meanings.sent1: The cladistically organized chart displayed the relationships between various species.
meanings.sent2: The cladistically grouped species shared a common ancestor according to the analysis.
meanings.sent3: The classroom had a cladistically arranged display of different animal skeletons.
meanings.sent4: The concept of a cladistically structured family tree helps in understanding evolutionary history.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit showcased a cladistically organized collection of plant specimens.
